title: What Does the 🤩 Star Eye Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The 🤩 means someone’s starstruck.
steps.content: The 🤩 means someone’s starstruck. A 🤩 represents that moment of speechlessness or fascination when you see your favorite celebrity. Your friend may add a 🤩 to their text about seeing a celebrity crush on TV. Basically, they’re in awe. [1] X Research source “Have you seen Josh Dallas’ new show yet? HUNK ALERT 🤩” “I don’t know how these reporters do this. I’d faint on a red carpet with this many stars 🤩😂”

steps.title: The 🤩 can also signal surprise.
steps.content: The 🤩 can also signal surprise. When someone is too stunned to speak, they may use the 🤩 to show they’re awestruck. This is a friendlier and more joyful version of 😱 or 😲. If it’s a good surprise, chances are someone will use a 🤩. [2] X Research source “This is so unexpected 🤩” “How did you pull this off?? I’m too stunned to speak 🤩”

steps.title: The 🤩 may also show that someone’s impressed.
steps.content: The 🤩 may also show that someone’s impressed. Who says being starstruck is only reserved for celebrities? A friend or crush may send you a 🤩 if they’re utterly amazed by you. This emoji is commonly used when making a heartfelt compliment. [3] X Research source “You’re absolutely brilliant! 🤩” “You were stunning in that dress last night 🤩😍”

steps.title: The 🤩 might mean excitement.
steps.content: The 🤩 might mean excitement. The dazzling eyes of the 🤩 emoji scream, “I’m so excited!” You may see this emoji used when someone’s over-the-moon ecstatic. [4] X Research source “Guess who just got us tickets to see BTS? 👀🤩” “Opening night is just around the corner 🤩”

steps.title: When you’re talking about a celebrity crush:
steps.content: When you’re talking about a celebrity crush: Send a 🤩 if you’re swooning over someone famous. You think they look amazing, possibly as incredible as the stars, so express those starstruck feelings with a 🤩. “I can’t believe I was THAT close to him 🤩” “Scarlett Johansson is just 🤩”

steps.title: When you’re surprised:
steps.content: When you’re surprised: Use a 🤩 if you’ve been surprised in an amazing way. You’re most likely grinning from ear to ear, and this emoji portrays your excitement and joy. [5] X Research source “I can’t believe you did this for me 🥺 Thank you! 🤩💕” “You did what!? I’m freaking out AHH 🤩😆”

steps.title: When you’re being supportive:
steps.content: When you’re being supportive: Say “wow” or “amazing” with a 🤩. Give a friend a round of applause and show them you are floored by how incredible they are with this emoji. [6] X Research source “Wow! You were incredible 🤩” “Is there anything you can’t do? 🤩”

steps.title: When you’re excited:
steps.content: When you’re excited: If you’re super-duper excited about something, share your thrill with a 🤩. Your enthusiasm can’t be put into words, so this cheerful face with dazzling eyes will do just the trick! “I’M GOING TO THE CONCERT 🤩🎉” “We’re going to Disneyland!! 🤩”
